description: The performance redeemed the pianist's shambolic outing with the Singapore Symphony Orchestra 15 years ago. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: Pianist Yundi Li offers crisp, articulate readings of Mozart’s sonatas
title_page: Concert review: Pianist Yundi Li offers crisp, articulate readings of Mozart’s sonatas | The Straits Times
maintext:
